name: Alas Alvarez
description:
'''Joshua Magsilong Alvarez''' (born March 28, 2001), also known professionally as '''Alas Alvarez''' or simply '''Alas''' (stylized in [[all caps]]), is a Filipino rapper, singer, songwriter, performer, and record producer. He is the lead rapper of the [[Pinoy pop|P-pop]] boy band [[Alamat (band)|Alamat]], who are known for their multilingual, multicultural advocacy. Alvarez is the group's representative for Cebuano{{Efn|This language is more widely known by its [[endonym]], Bisaya.}} speakers. He is the first active member of Alamat to release a solo single with "Don't Play", a hip-hop track written in Cebuano, Tagalog, and English released on February 7, 2025.

In 2026, Alvarez joined the cast of the upcoming mystery horror series ''[[Hell University]]''.
